pageProduct.name: Swisse Deep Face Scrub For Men 120ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Deep Face Scrub For Men is created with natural Walnut Shell Powder to buff away dead skin cells and oil build-up, while Rice Bran and Glycerin work to hydrate and soothe. Skin is left smooth, soft and invigorated.

Warnings

This product contains essential oils. Test prior to use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, consult your medical practitioner. Store below 28°C

Common Uses

Energising scrub to buff away dead skin cells & excess oil

Ingredients

Water (Aqua) Juglans Regia (Walnut) Shell Powder Glycerin (Plant Derived) Cocamidopropyl Betaine Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Zea Mays (Corn) Starch Bambusa Arundinacea Stem Powder Xanthan Gum Coco-Glucoside Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil Vetiveria Zizanoides Root Oil Cedrus Atlantica Bark Oil Juniperus Virginiana Wood Oil Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil Abies Sibirica (Siberian Fir) Oil Mentha Spicata Herb Oil Citric Acid Benzyl Alcohol Dehydroacetic Acid

Directions

Blend a small amount between palms and gently massage into wet skin in a circular motion. Rinse with warm water. Recommended for use 2-3 times weekly.
